revised_title: Investigating the Impact of Root-Excretions on Crop Rotation and Inorganic Matter Absorption
tldr: Charles G. B. Daubeny investigates the effects of crop rotation and root excretions on the absorption of inorganic matter by plants. He finds that root excretions have a limited impact on crop growth, and that the availability of inorganic matter in the soil plays a more significant role in crop productivity.
